patterns.model_pattern: All models inherit from SoftDeleteModel or BaseModel with UUID primary keys, use SQLAlchemy mapped_column, and store JSON configs as Text fields
patterns.service_pattern: Services are in src/pybase/services/ and contain business logic, using dependency injection
patterns.api_pattern: API endpoints are in src/pybase/api/v1/ using FastAPI routers with consistent response models
patterns.frontend_pattern: React TypeScript components with TailwindCSS, using TanStack Query for API integration
patterns.realtime_pattern: WebSocket manager in src/pybase/realtime/ for live updates
patterns.worker_pattern: Celery workers in workers/ directory for background tasks

existing_implementations.description: Found existing View model (similar structure to Dashboard), Automation model with scheduling (cron-based), WebSocket manager for real-time updates, and multiple view components in frontend
relevant_files: src/pybase/models/view.py - Similar model structure with JSON config fields
src/pybase/models/automation.py - Has SCHEDULED trigger type with cron expressions
src/pybase/api/v1/views.py - API endpoint patterns to follow
src/pybase/realtime/manager.py - WebSocket patterns for real-time updates
